function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to UV-C radiation from the Surfacide system","Impact":"Potential health risks due to UV-C exposure","Mitigation":"Proper training, use of protective equipment, and adherence to safety guidelines","Technologies":"UV-C protective barriers, warning systems, and exposure monitoring devices","People":"Healthcare workers, researchers, and anyone in close proximity to the system","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, research institution management"},{"Description":"Handling of dried virus and potential exposure to infectious material","Impact":"Risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment, and proper decontamination procedures","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and chemical disinfectants","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Laboratory management, research institution management"},{"Description":"Handling of infectious materials in the built environment","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of infection control measures, regular cleaning and disinfection, and proper waste management","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems, air filtration systems, and automated cleaning technologies","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, and cleaning staff","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"}]}
